=== Set ctags binary path ===
aprof-plot need to know where ctags is installed on your system. By default, it will search ctags as `ctags-exuberant`. If your ctags has another name, you can set the right name (or the right path) in _aprof-plot > edit > settings > Tools > ctags binary_.
